barrks 0.9.0.0

    The BSO model Example: Model comparison Model customization Station data Use a storage

    Function reference

    Main Functions

    phenology()
    Central function to calculate a phenology
    model()
    Get a phenology model
    model_combine()
    Combine different (sub-)models
    list_models()
    List all models
    params()
    Get model parameters
    bso_phenology()
    Calculate phenology with the BSO model
    bso_translate_phenology()
    Translate BSO generated phenology
    save_phenology()
    Save a phenology
    load_phenology()
    Load a phenology

    Plots

    plot_development_diagram()
    Plot a development diagram
    bso_plot_flight_diagram()
    Plot a flight diagram (BSO only)
    bso_plot_stage_diagram()
    Plot a stage diagram (BSO only)

    Results

    prop_year() prop_dates() prop_first_date() prop_last_date() prop_hatched_generations() prop_filial_generations() prop_sister_broods() prop_stations()
    Get phenology properties
    get_development_rst() get_development_df()
    Get the beetles development
    get_onset_rst() get_onset_df() get_diapause_rst() get_diapause_df() get_mortality_rst() get_mortality_df()
    Get onset, diapause or mortality
    get_generations_rst() get_generations_df() get_hibernating_generations_rst() get_hibernating_generations_df()
    Get generations
    get_input_data()
    Get (preprocessed) input data
    bso_get_flight_rst() bso_get_flight_df()
    Get flight of individuals (BSO only)
    bso_get_individuals_rst() bso_get_individuals_df()
    Get individuals (BSO only)
    categorize_generations_rst()
    Make a numeric generations raster categorical

    Create data

    create_daylength_df()
    Create a data frame of daylengths
    create_daylength_rst()
    Create daylength rasters
    create_onset() create_diapause() create_mortality()
    Create phenological events (onset/diapause/mortality)
    create_suntimes_df()
    Create a data frame of sunrises and sunsets
    create_suntimes_rsts()
    Create rasters that indicate sunrise and sunset

    Stations handling

    stations_assign()
    Assign stations to a phenology
    stations_cells()
    Get the raster cells of stations
    stations_create()
    Build stations
    stations_names()
    Get the names of stations

    Data

    barrks_data()
    Load sample data
    barrks_colors()
    Get barrks default color palettes
    barrks_labels()
    Get barrks default legend labels
    phenips_clim_get_dev_rates()
    Get development rates for PHENIPS-Clim

    On this page
